long_description: This Magnetic Hangman travel game from Toysmith puts a fun twist on a classic game that travels well for road trips, airplane rides and general on-the-go fun. Magnetic letters and hangman parts let your young ones create a game board anywhere; no pencils or paper necessary. Magnetic Hangman travel game is recommended for ages 6 and up.
short_description: This Magnetic Hangman travel game from Toysmith puts a fun twist on a classic game that travels well for road trips, airplane rides and general on-the-go fun.
